name: Wáng Hún - Revenant
description:
Take control of the stranded starship 'Wáng Hún' (Revenant). Survive the oncoming bombardment from an unknown source until the crew has repaired the ships warp drive. 

NOTE.

This is a early prototype and there are a lot of features missing and tons of bugs. If you like it, leave a comment and tell us. And if you don't like it, you have to share why! :)
